org.qiweb.api.cache

Interface Cache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheAdapter, MapCache 

    public interface Cache
    Cache.

    • Method Detail

      • has

        boolean has(String key)
        Check if the Cache has an object for a given key.
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        Returns:
        true if the cache has an object for the given key

      • get

        <T> T get(String key)
        Fetch cached object for a given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        Returns:
        The cached object for the given key, or null if absent

      • getOptional

        <T> Optional<T> getOptional(String key)
        Optionaly fetch cached object for a given key.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        Returns:
        An Optional of the cached object for the given key

      • getOrSetDefault

        <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                      T defaultValue)
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set a non-expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        defaultValue - Default Value
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null

      • getOrSetDefault

        <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                      Supplier<T> defaultValueSupplier)
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set a non-expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        defaultValueSupplier - Default Value Supplier
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null

      • getOrSetDefault

        <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                      int ttlSeconds,
                      T defaultValue)
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set an expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        ttlSeconds - Default Value Time To Live in seconds. If 0 (ZERO), then the entry will never expire
        defaultValue - Default Value
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null

      • getOrSetDefault

        <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                      int ttlSeconds,
                      Supplier<T> defaultValueSupplier)
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set an expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        ttlSeconds - Default Value Time To Live in seconds. If 0 (ZERO), then the entry will never expire
        defaultValueSupplier - Default Value Supplier
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null

      • set

        <T> void set(String key,
             T value)
        Set a non-expiring object for a given key in the Cache.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        value - Value Object

      • set

        <T> void set(int ttlSeconds,
             String key,
             T value)
        Set an expiring object for a given key in the Cache.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        ttlSeconds - Time To Live in seconds. If 0 (ZERO), then the entry will not expire
        key - Cache Key
        value - Value Object

      • remove

        void remove(String key)
        Remove a Cache entry.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the entry to remove
